title: Better Bucs Tomorrow
description:
Mina is joined by Charles McDonald to preview the NFC South; including if they think that Baker Mayfield can make the Panthers a playoff contender, the big news that Julio Jones is going to team up with Tom Brady in Tampa Bay, if the Saints have really made the salary cap obsolete, and the few things that Falcons fans should have to look forward to this season. All that and more!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
